DOC.brief_summary: The present study aim investigate relative efficacy , safety risk single-dose prophylaxis otherwise healthy adult patient undergo ureteroscopic procedure ureteral stone .
DOC.brief_title: Is Prophylactic Antibiotics Necessary In Otherwise Healthy Adult Patients Undergoing Ureteroscopic Procedures Ureteral Stones ?
DOC.criteria: 100 otherwise healthy adult patient . Aged 20 65 year . Undergoing ureteroscopic procedure ureteral stone . Have urine road infection surgical operation , surgical operation take antibiotic first 2 week . Pregnant woman breast feeding .
